problem.p: An engineer has calculated that a column will fail by buckling under the expected load. How could the engineer modify the column so it will not fail?

choicegroup.label: An engineer has calcuated that a column will fail by buckling under the expected load. How should the engineer modify the column so it will not fail?
choicegroup.choice: Change the length/height of the column
Change the width or diameter of the column
Change the material that is used for the column
Change the shape of the column
